basics.name: Vlad Mutilica
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a software developer specialized in Python, Java, JavaScript and TypeScript. I am product focused and customer-centric. My interests lie in ML/LLM and Optimization. I feel at home working on backend projects. In my spare time I like to 3D model and DJ.

work.summary: Financial Technology firm offering bespoke ERP software solutions for business platforms like Google, IBM and KPMG. My role in the Software Engineering department was developing, testing and maintaining the SCPQ estimation product, with a particular focus on rolling out the ground-breaking Guided Scoping feature. This capability offers the user a natural interface that translates natural language to formal queries and automated procedures, making the users more effective at designing and implementing the optimized projects. Furthermore, my work encompassed a variety of infrastructure related tasks that exposed me to a wide range of languages like but not limited to Python, Groovy and Ruby. During my time at Certinia I acquired a solid understanding of the agile and fintech background while becoming well versed in enterprise software development including query optimization, security frameworks, and comprehensive unit/integration testing.
work.name: Certinia ( formerly FinancialForce )

work.summary: As part of my role as a Junior AEM developer I worked in a team responsible for implementing client websites using Adobe Experience Manager. The stack I worked on was Java based using Spring for dependency management. This placement exposed me to a real life software development environment where I learned valuable skills related to programming and agile methodologies.
work.name: IBM Summer Placement
